incomeTaxes.name: Personal Income Tax (Single)
incomeTaxes.notes: 2024 tax year. Progressive tax system with solidarity surcharge of 5.5% on income tax for income above €75,000. Basic personal allowance (Grundfreibetrag) of €11,604.

incomeTaxes.name: Personal Income Tax (Married Joint)
incomeTaxes.notes: 2024 tax year. Married couples can file jointly (Ehegattensplitting). Thresholds are double those of single filers.

wealthTaxes.name: Wealth Tax (Vermögensteuer)
wealthTaxes.notes: Germany abolished its wealth tax in 1997. Currently no wealth tax exists.

capitalGainsTaxes.name: Capital Gains Tax (Abgeltungsteuer)
capitalGainsTaxes.notes: 2024 tax year. Flat rate of 25% plus solidarity surcharge of 5.5% on the tax. Annual exemption (Sparerpauschbetrag) of €1,000 for single filers, €2,000 for married couples filing jointly.
